text: Ramón J. Garay (1896–1956) was a Spanish film actor who appeared in the Cinema of Argentina in the classic era of the 1940s and 1950s. Although a familiar face of the period in films he didn't enter film until the age of 45. He appeared in over 30 films between 1941 and his death in 1956 as a character actor, starring in films such as Al toque de clarín (1941), Buenos Aires a la vista and Al compás de tu mentira (1950), Con la música en el alma (1951), Amor a primera vista (1956) and Novia para dos (1956). ==Selected filmography== * María Rosa (1946) * El Muerto es un vivo (1953) * The Age of Love (1954) ==External links== * Category:1896 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Argentine male film actors Category:Spanish male film actors Category:Expatriate male actors in Argentina Category:Spanish expatriates in Argentina
title: Ramón Garay
